TopicTitle: Game freezing (And eventually crashing) after seperated parts collide with terrain

Articles.Content:
Hey all!

I'm not entirely sure where to start out with debugging the issue.
Playing RP1/RO and a few extra mods on linux bazzite, has been perfectly fine up until now.

The game runs perfectly fine, up until the booster stage hits the ground. The game freezes for a couple of minutes and requires me to force quit.
I can very consistently recreate the issue with my KOS launch script at least.

If anyone can point me towards 1) a fix, or 2) the information needed to better diagnose this, that would be awesome!

The whole KSP.log entry for the most recent flight that caused this issue is:
